law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 4, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 9, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1209, effective July 15, 2010; and ch. 85, sec. 46, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 253, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 144, sec. 7, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 351, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 376, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2001; ch. 476, sec. 17, effective July 14, 2000; and ch. 521, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 1, effective April 10, 1998.
